description.long_description: A handling fee of HK$50 will be charged for the conversion of each 5,000 Miles (for conversion with less than 5,000 Miles will also be charged at the rate of 5,000 Miles), subject to a minimum of HK$100 or a maximum of HK$300 per transaction.
